name: Quick Links Main
editableFields: Quick Links Title: Text that returns as 'Quicklinks' in HTML mockup for box heading
Link Link Text: Text for first linkâ€¦field repeats up to 5 times for up to 5 links (for example QuickLink2_Linktext etc)
Link Url: HREF and target window to link up the Linktext with...field repeats up to 5 times for up to 5 links (for example QuickLink2_Href etc)

description: Displays title box with a list of links and descriptions. Up to 5 links can be added. This cartridge has a max width of 1180px and is fully responsive.
